Subject: Use of FinalizationForcingReferenceMap?

As far as I can see, 
org.apache.commons.collections.map.FinalizationForcin=
gReferenceMap is not 
used (anymore). Are there any plans to use it in futu=
re versions of Heritrix 
or can it be removed along with the corresponding =
testcase?

For completeness, I may add that the serialVersionUID of that cl=
ass is 
generated from the wrong class (BdbFrontier).

Cheers,
--
